text: Tina Kotek (born September 30, 1966) is an American politician who is the 39th Governor of Oregon since 2023. She was the speaker of the Oregon House of Representatives from 2013 to 2022. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Along with Maura Healey, she will be one of the first two openly lesbian governors in the United States. Kotek, a lesbian, was one of the only openly- gay members of the Oregon Legislative Assembly. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American LGBT politicians Category:Lesbians Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:LGBT people from Pennsylvania Category:Governors of Oregon Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:American LGBT rights activists
title: Tina Kotek
